<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"tenantId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the tenant"},"memberId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the member"},"eventId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the event"},"metadata":{"type":"object","description":"Additional metadata for the event"},"eventTime":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Time when the event occurred"},"processingStatus":{"type":"string","enum":["pending","processing","completed"],"description":"Status of event processing"}},"required":["tenantId","memberId","eventId","eventTime"],"title":"EventLogCreate"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
